name: dishonesty
lyrics:
作词 : Gareth.T
作曲 : Gareth.T/Teddy Fan
编曲 : Gareth.T/Patrick Yip/Teddy Fan
Honest , i never meant to break your heart
坦白说，我从未想过要伤你的心
But i'm too honest
但我过于直率
I try to hold back on my words
我试图收敛我的言辞
But they got edges
却总是带着锋芒
I hope a bandage and some kisses
我希望温柔的安慰和亲吻
Make it better
能够弥补过错
But it never works
可惜从未奏效


Cause honesty
因为坦率
Honestly ain't your cup of tea
老实说并非你所爱
Maybe it's me
或许是我的问题
Cause i rarely
因为我鲜少
Think before i speak
思考后再开口
And i know you
我了解你
And you f**k with coffee more than tea
你偏爱咖啡胜过茶
I dont want u to leave
我不愿你离开
But my replies all come from spreadsheet
但我的回应总显得公式化
Romantic on the wrong beats
在错误的时机才显得浪漫
When you're right bout to leave
恰在你即将离去之际


So i’ll be this honest
所以我会如此坦率
For the first time
第一次承认
Say it's alright
说这样也无妨
I won't stop you
我不会挽留你
Cause honestly this ain't work out
因为说实话这段感情难以为继
So dishonesty
所以不坦率
Be the end of u and me
将成为你我的终点


Me me me you and me
我 我 我 你和我
Me me me you and me
我 我 我 你和我
Me me me you and me
我 我 我 你和我


And honestly
老实说
I never thought that you and me
我从未想过你我之间
Would have this distance
会产生如此距离
Now i barely call you up
如今我很少给你来电
Don’t meet in person
不再见面
And i know that you tried
我知道你曾努力
And u cried over night
你曾彻夜哭泣
And we came to a time
我们已到了这样一刻
When goodbyes feel right
道别似乎成了唯一选择


And honesty honestly
而坦率，老实说
Ain't your cup of tea
并非你所爱
I know its me
我知道问题在我
Cause i rarely think before i speak
因为我很少深思熟虑再开口
I've tried to change
我试图改变
But i find good things
但我发现美好的事物
Real hard to keep
总是难以维系
I tell you, you could leave
我告诉你，你可以离开
While my heart disagrees
尽管我内心不愿
Not the boyfriend that u needed
我不是你需要的那种伴侣
Now i'm watching as you leave
此刻我只能看着你离去


So i’ll be this honest
所以我会如此坦率
For the first time say it's alright
第一次承认说这样也无妨
I won't stop you
我不会挽留你
Cause honestly this aint working out
因为说实话这段感情难以为继
So dishonesty
所以不坦率
Be the end of u and me
将成为你我的终点


Me me me you and me
我 我 我 你和我
Me me me you and me
我 我 我 你和我
Me me me you and me
我 我 我 你和我


And me
还有我
母带工程师 : Alex Psaroudakis
人声 : Gareth.T
器乐 : Gareth.T/Patrick Yip/Teddy Fan
混音师 : Jay Tse
收起
